Trigger.name: Summoners in room
Trigger.script:
for i = 1, #matches do local line = matches[i]
local pos = selectString(line, i) fg("coral") moveCursor("main", pos+#line+4, getLineNumber())
svo.summoner = (svo.summoner or 0) + 1 cinsertText(string.format(" <a_red>(<orange>%s%s<a_red>)", svo.summoner, string.ordinalSuffix(svo.summoner))) moveCursorEnd() deselect() resetFormat() end
svo.prompttrigger("clear summoners", function() svo.summoner = nil end)
